Title: toISOWeek
Description: Converts a date, or date with time, to a UInt8 number containing the ISO Week number.
value — The value with date or date with time.
value converted to the current ISO week number. UInt8.
Examples: SELECT  toISOWeek(toDate('2024/10/02')) AS week1,  toISOWeek(toDateTime('2024/10/02 01:30:00')) AS week2
